message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counteroffer at $9,500 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer.  I appreciate your interest. While I value our discussion, $9,500 is still a bit below my target price. How about we meet in the middle at $9,750?  This would be a fair compromise and allow us both to get a good deal.

I understand your position, Alice. I'm willing to consider $9,700 as a counteroffer. I believe this price reflects the value of the product while remaining within my budget. I look forward to your response.
